page.title: 20POPULATION
page.content: In our block, according to the electoral roll, there are 2012 adults.In Swadelands there are 840 children; 203 come from our area. 60 children attend Upper Schools in Maidstone & 14 children are at private schools. There are 137 children under the age of five. There are approximately 150 young people between the ages of sixteen and eighteen. This gives a population of 2576. From a census of 200 households we found that six per cent of the working population travel to London daily to work, fifteen per cent to Maidstone, twenty-seven per cent to other nearby towns, fifty-one per cent work locally & one per cent are unemployed. Twenty- one per cent of those counted were Old Age Pensioners.
